message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can have a small share
You took a big lead last round, now it's my turn to push back!
I'll give you a bigger share this time, don't reject it
I'm not backing down, take it or leave it!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you more
Last chance to make a deal, or we both walk away with nothing!
I'm taking a risk, but I'll give you a lot this time
This is my final offer, take it or walk away!
I'm almost out of options, but I'll give you most of it
